resources:
Music Buddy 連接
connect 中斷連接
disconnect 停止監測
stop monitoring 開始監測
start monitoring 等待腦波前測
waiting for raw signal... 等待
waiting for blink signal... 等待冥想值
waiting for meditation signal... 等待專注值
waiting for attention signal... 等待連接
waiting for state... ok 才不要 放棄添加 測試完成
Test has been completed 歌曲已播放完畢
Your playlist has been finished 工作 WORK 放鬆 RELAX 沮喪 DEPRESS 睡眠 SLEEP Sign in
Email Password (optional) Sign in or register Sign in This email address is invalid This password is too short This password is incorrect This field is required "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
teststring> 1. 請確認網路連接正常

 2. 確認裝置上有安裝YOUTUBE軟體

 3. 開啟手機藍芽及腦波儀並連接

 4. 配戴腦波儀時請將中間的兩顆金屬接收器對準眉心上方，旁邊的接收器對準左邊太陽穴，注意接收器與皮膚中間不要有毛髮或阻隔物

 5. 在播放頁面按下PLAY按鈕撥放歌曲前，請先按下CONNECT以確保連接並等待約90秒進行前測

 6. 進行腦波前測時，請保持穩定、平靜的狀態

 7. 若一首歌的測量時間未達90秒，將視為測量未完成，不加入播放清單中

 1.Please check the internet is well connected.

 2.Make sure you have download YouTube APP on your device.

 3.Turn on bluetooth and wait for the connection with EEG.

 4.Adjust the forehead Sensor of the headset so that the Sensor Tip makes contact with the skin of your forehead. Sensor Tip must maintain steady skin contact in order to properly measure your brainwaves, it will not work through hair, yet stay firmly in position. The sensor must directly contact the skin at all times. Make up, dead skin, or debris can interfere with the connection.Scratch or wipe the obstruction away if you have trouble obtaining a clean signal.

 5.Before pressing the PLAY button on the player interface,please press the CONNECT button first and wait about 90 seconds for the raw brainwave data recording process.

 6.When doing the raw brainwave data recording process,please keep calm and make sure yourself in a peaceful state.

 7.If the measuring time of one song did not reach 100 seconds,the song will not be considered.
